attributes.action: Parliamentary reform to prevent successive govts from ruining our country.
attributes.background:
Replace first past the post with proportional representation.
Manifesto is a legal contract and can be terminated, i.e. For policies contrary to manifesto and not implementing 75% of manifesto by end of year 2. 
Party members whose contract has been terminated barred for life from public office.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Referendum on changing the Electoral System To Proportional Representation (PR)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700109

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
